12 
19  public static function isAssociative($array) {
20  return (array_keys ( $array ) !== range ( 0, count ( $array ) - 1 ));
21  }
22 
32  public static function extractKeys($array, $keys) {
33  $result = [ ];
34  foreach ( $keys as $key ) {
35  if (isset ( $array [$key] )) {
36  $result [$key] = $array [$key];
37  }
38  }
39  return $result;
40  }
41 
49  public static function getValue($array, $key, $pos) {
50  if (array_key_exists ( $key, $array )) {
51  return $array [$key];
52  }
53  $values = array_values ( $array );
54  if ($pos < sizeof ( $values ))
55  return $values [$pos];
56  }
57 
65  public static function getRecursive($array, $key, $default = null) {
66  if (array_key_exists ( $key, $array )) {
67  return $array [$key];
68  } else {
69  foreach ( $array as $item ) {
70  if (is_array ( $item )) {
71  return self::getRecursive ( $item, $key, $default );
72  }
73  }
74  }
75  return $default;
76  }
77 
78  public static function getDefaultValue($array, $key, $default) {
79  return $array [$key] ?? $default;
80  }
81 
82  public static function asPhpArray($array, $prefix = "", $depth = 1, $format = false) {
83  $exts = array ();
84  $extsStr = "";
85  $tab = "";
86  $nl = "";
87  if ($format) {
88  $tab = str_repeat ( "\t", $depth );
89  $nl = PHP_EOL;
90  }
91  foreach ( $array as $k => $v ) {
92  if (is_string ( $k )) {
93  $exts [] = "\"" . UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $k ) . "\"=>" . self::parseValue ( $v, 'array', $depth + 1, $format );
94  } else {
95  $exts [] = self::parseValue ( $v, $prefix, $depth + 1, $format );
96  }
97  }
98  if (\sizeof ( $exts ) > 0 || $prefix !== "") {
99  $extsStr = "(" . \implode ( "," . $nl . $tab, $exts ) . ")";
100  if (\sizeof ( $exts ) > 0) {
101  $extsStr = "(" . $nl . $tab . \implode ( "," . $nl . $tab, $exts ) . $nl . $tab . ")";
102  }
103  }
104  return $prefix . $extsStr;
105  }
106 
107  public static function asJSON($array) {
108  return json_encode ( $array, JSON_HEX_TAG | JSON_HEX_APOS | JSON_HEX_QUOT | JSON_HEX_AMP | JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE );
109  }
110 
111  public static function remove($array, $search) {
112  if (\is_array ( $search )) {
113  foreach ( $search as $val ) {
114  $array = self::removeOne ( $array, $val );
115  }
116  } else {
117  $array = self::removeOne ( $array, $search );
118  }
119  return array_values ( $array );
120  }
121 
129  public static function removeByKey($array, $key) {
130  if (isset ( $array [$key] )) {
131  unset ( $array [$key] );
132  }
133  return $array;
134  }
135 
136  public static function removeRecursive(&$array, $key) {
137  foreach ( $array as &$item ) {
138  if (array_key_exists ( $key, $item )) {
139  unset ( $item [$key] );
140  } elseif (is_array ( $item )) {
141  self::removeRecursive ( $item, $key );
142  }
143  }
144  }
145 
146  public static function removeByKeys($array, $keys) {
147  $assocKeys = [ ];
148  foreach ( $keys as $key ) {
149  $assocKeys [$key] = true;
150  }
151  return array_diff_key ( $array, $assocKeys );
152  }
153 
154  public static function removeOne($array, $search) {
155  if (($key = array_search ( $search, $array )) !== false) {
156  unset ( $array [$key] );
157  }
158  return $array;
159  }
160 
161  public static function update(&$array, $search, $newValue) {
162  if (($key = array_search ( $search, $array )) !== false) {
163  $array [$key] = $newValue;
164  }
165  return $array;
166  }
167 
173  public static function doubleBackSlashes(&$array) {
174  return array_walk ( $array, function (&$value) {
175  $value = UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $value );
176  } );
177  }
178 
179  private static function parseValue($v, $prefix = "", $depth = 1, $format = false) {
180  if (\is_numeric ( $v )) {
181  $result = $v;
182  } elseif (UString::isBooleanStr ( $v )) {
183  $result = UString::getBooleanStr ( $v );
184  } elseif (\is_array ( $v )) {
185  $result = self::asPhpArray ( $v, $prefix, $depth + 1, $format );
186  } elseif (is_string ( $v ) && (UString::startswith ( trim ( $v ), '$config' ) || UString::startswith ( trim ( $v ), "function" ) || UString::startswith ( trim ( $v ), "array(" ))) {
187  $result = $v;
188  } elseif ($v instanceof \Closure) {
189  $result = UIntrospection::closure_dump ( $v );
190  } else {
191  $result = "\"" . \str_replace ( '$', '\$', $v ) . "\"";
192  $result = UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $result );
193  }
194  return $result;
195  }
196 
197  public static function iSearch($needle, $haystack, $strict = null) {
198  return array_search ( strtolower ( $needle ), array_map ( 'strtolower', $haystack ), $strict );
199  }
200 
201  public static function iRemove($array, $search) {
202  if (\is_array ( $search )) {
203  foreach ( $search as $val ) {
204  $array = self::iRemoveOne ( $array, $val );
205  }
206  } else {
207  $array = self::iRemoveOne ( $array, $search );
208  }
209  return array_values ( $array );
210  }
211 
212  public static function iRemoveOne($array, $search) {
213  if (($key = self::iSearch ( $search, $array )) !== false) {
214  unset ( $array [$key] );
215  }
216  return $array;
217  }
218 }
